name: Tobacco Master Case Sales
query:
select
TRIM(SUBSTRING(item.item_code from 1 for  LOCATE('GM',item.item_code)+1)) as 'Flavor' ,
round(coalesce(sum(total_weight),0),2) DIV 6 as 'MC',
sum(total_weight) AS 'Total Weight (Kg):Float:130'
from `tabSales Invoice` si
inner join `tabSales Invoice Item` item 
ON si.name = item.parent
AND si.docstatus = 1
AND item.item_group in (select name from `tabItem Group` where parent_item_group in ('TOBACCO'))
INNER JOIN `tabItem` IT
ON IT.item_code = item.item_code
WHERE si.posting_date >= %(from_date)s and si.posting_date <= %(to_date)s
group by TRIM(SUBSTRING(item.item_code from 1 for  LOCATE('GM',item.item_code)+1)) 
ORDER BY TRIM(SUBSTRING(item.item_code from 1 for  LOCATE('GM',item.item_code)+1))
